animeDescription: A 3 minute promotional episode of Nougyou Musume, titled Episode 0.  The story centers around Hikari and Hikaru Koshino, two sisters who take care of the paddy they inherited from their parents.  Together, the sisters grow rice and hang out with their friends in the local area.  (Source: Neregate)
